preguntas.pregunta: In which century did Málaga experience a significant industrial boom?
What product was famous for being made at the Málaga chocolate factory 'La Riojana'?
In which neighborhood of Málaga was the 'Industria Malagueña S.A.' factory located?
What was the main source of energy used in Málaga industries in the 19th century?
Which industrial sector was a pioneer in the introduction of steam machinery in Málaga?
Which two historical events contributed to the decline of Málaga's industry in the 20th century?
respuestas: First World War and Second World War
Hundred Years' War and French Revolution
Spanish Civil War and Oil Crisis
preguntas.respuesta_correcta: Spanish Civil War and Oil Crisis

preguntas.pregunta: What has the former industrial area of Málaga been converted into in recent decades?
What role does industry currently play in Málaga's economy?
respuestas: It remains an important sector, although its relevance has decreased.
It has largely been replaced by tourism and services.
It is experiencing a resurgence thanks to innovation and new technologies.
It does not play a significant role in the local economy.
preguntas.respuesta_correcta: It remains an important sector, although its relevance has decreased.

preguntas.pregunta: What is the name of the association that defends Málaga's industrial heritage?
respuestas: Industrial Historical Legacy of the Province

preguntas.pregunta: What role did Málaga's industry play in the development of the railway in Andalusia?
respuestas: Financing the construction of rail lines

preguntas.pregunta: What agricultural product was fundamental for Málaga's oil industry?
Which port played an important role in exporting industrial products?
What natural resource contributed to the development of the steel industry in Málaga?
What important infrastructure was built in Málaga in 1848 that favored industrial development?
What was the main reason for the decline of the steel industry in Málaga at the end of the 19th century?
What technology allowed a significant increase in Málaga's textile production in the 19th century?
What technological innovation was adopted in Málaga's industry at the beginning of the 20th century?
What important economic change affected Málaga's industry in the second half of the 20th century?
respuestas: Integration into the European Economic Community
preguntas.respuesta_correcta: Integration into the European Economic Community
